posts.post_content:
I am selling some of what I have left of my B18 blanket collection. What is left are high grade meaning four full brown borders , nice clarity and color. I am attaching the images of all 13 and the prices of the 6 that are left. I am always surprised that the lower grade ones sell easier for similar prices.........HMM. Please feel free to ask any questions. I will consider lowering the prices some for a group deal or the remaining 6
